description: Resource Type definition for AWS::CloudFront::TrustStore. TrustStores contain CA certificates for mTLS authentication and can be associated with CloudFront distributions.

Id.description: The unique identifier for the trust store
Id.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier for the trust store

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Name.description: A unique name to identify the trust store
Name.markdownDescription:
A unique name to identify the trust store

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trust store
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trust store

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:cloudfront::[0-9]{12}:trust-store/[A-Za-z0-9_]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Status.description: Current status of the trust store
Status.markdownDescription:
Current status of the trust store

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PENDING | ACTIVE | FAILED  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
